descriptionHtml:
Umbra from oblivion, I made the model and textures from scratch within Maya and Photoshop,
Umbra has the soul trap ability like in oblivion and is one handed.

For now umbra can only be obtained by using the console, to open the console press either \"~\" or \" ` \" , within console \"type help umbra 4\"  it will show you some text look for weapon and next to it you will see a number, type player.additem \"number\" so for me its player.additem 04000900, it might be the same for you
If player.additem 04000900 doesnt work (or whatever your number is, Try adding a space and one at the end...so......   player.additem 04000900 1

Install

Place the folder Data in your program files>steam>steam apps>common>skyrim folder.
author: DigitalLion
